Description_lang: Damage taken while inside your Consecration is reduced by an additional amount based on your Mastery.

description_blz.en_US: Damage taken while inside your Consecration is reduced by an additional amount based on your Mastery.
description_blz.es_MX: El daño recibido dentro de tu Consagración se reduce un monto adicional según tu maestría.
description_blz.pt_BR: Dano recebido dentro da sua Consagração sofre uma redução adicional baseada na sua Maestria.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert sämtlichen erlittenen Schaden, während Ihr Euch in Eurer 'Weihe' aufhaltet, basierend auf Eurer Meisterschaft um einen zusätzlichen Betrag.
description_blz.en_GB: Damage taken while inside your Consecration is reduced by an additional amount based on your Mastery.
description_blz.es_ES: Mientras te encuentras dentro de tu Consagración, se reduce una cantidad extra del daño recibido en función de tu maestría.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les dégâts subis tant que vous vous tenez dans la zone d’effet de votre Consécration sont réduits d’un montant supplémentaire en fonction de votre Maîtrise.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce tutti i danni subiti quando ci si trova nell'area d'effetto della propria Consacrazione in base alla maestria.
description_blz.ru_RU: Дополнительно уменьшает урон, получаемый в области "Освящения", в зависимости от вашей искусности.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신성화 내에 있는 동안 받는 피해가 특화에 따라 추가로 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 待在奉獻效果範圍內期間所受到的傷害額外降低，效果視你的精通而定。
description_blz.zh_CN: 基于你的精通，你在自己的奉献中受到的伤害会进一步降低。
